thing-type.description: Panic Button Key Fob<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Aeon Labs Panic Button is a fully functional Z-Wave remote control capable of adding, removing, and controlling other Z-Wave devices. it can also become a secondary or inclusion controller to a SIS gateway in the Z-Wave network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPress the Learn button on your Panic Button with the pin or press the bottom- right action button. Your Panic Buttonâ€™s green light will begin to pulse.</li&gt <li&gtWhen Panic Button successfully joins your Z-Wave network, its LED will flash green slowly 3 times and then quickly flash green for 2 seconds before turning solid green for 2 seconds.</li&gt <li&gtShould the LED continue to flash green for 30 seconds before turning off, it has been unable to join your Z-Wave network; repeat the above steps and please contact us for further support if needed.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtReset:</p&gt <p&gtYour Panic Button can be reset to default factory settings with ease.</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtPress and hold the Learn button for 20 seconds with a pin.</li&gt <li&gtThe green and red light will alternate for 20 seconds, then the green light will stay solid for 2 seconds to indicate a successful reset</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtNot Provided</p&gt
